p: The material for TEM was fixed as above. Ultra-thin sections (60–70 nm thick) were cut from the embedded material, subsequently stained with uranyl acetate and post-stained in lead citrate (Reynolds 1963). Then, the sections were examined with an FEI Technai-G2 Spirit Bio TWIN transmission electron microscope at an accelerating voltage of 120 kV. TEM images were taken using a Megaview G2 Olympus Soft Imaging Solution camera.
